Title: Archery Master
Description: The prey's destiny is sealed as the arrow leaves the bowstring. Using a bow grants a 20% chance to designate any hit part as a weak spot, and reduces the target's Movement Speed by 50% for 6 seconds.

Title: Experience - Battle-tested
Description: Has a lot of combat experience and skills. DMG taken -[40,50,60]% when fighting as a companion.

Title: Chest Breaker
Description: Able to quickly open any box, no matter how intricate it is. The speed of opening boxes +80%.

Title: Heartcaptor
Description: The notorious executioner of the tribe. +12% Damage when attacking the Torso of the target.

Title: The Chosen
Description: There are always a few lucky folks in every village, and I'm one of them! Chance of dropping rare items +20%.

Title: Fly Cutter Assassin
Description: Made a name by taking down a tribal leader with a fly cutter from several meters away, leaving him bleeding out. When hitting the target, inflicts a bleeding effect that drains HP equal to 20% of self ATK per second, lasting 10s, and stackable.

Title: The Unburned
Description: Because of their strange skin, tribesmen see them as alien. They are not affected by burn or ignition effects.

Title: Blood Drinker
Description: Blood nourishment. 40% of Bleeding DMG dealt to melee targets is converted into healing. If the unit is currently Bleeding, this effect is increased to 80%.

Title: Unlucky One
Description: The legendary figure of misfortune in the neighborhood. Chance of dropping rare items -50%.

Title: Farming Expert
Description: Experienced in farming. The crops the character plants grow 20% faster.

Title: Born Laborer
Description: Destined to be a hardworking laborer, with a 50% increase in proficiency growth rate for logging, mining.

Title: The Flammable
Description: The greasy body seems as though it's been soaked in an oil tank. When ignited, the HP loss will be doubled.

Title: Expert Craftsman
Description: Skilled in crafting, the proficiency growth rate for cooking and crafting +50%.

Title: Butcher In Woods
Description: Animal killer; Damage dealt to non-human creatures +10%.

Title: Skilled Hand
Description: Skilled in crafting, the proficiency growth rate for weapon crafting, armor crafting, and alchemy +50%.

Title: Death Bringer
Description: Gets a rush from attacking near-death enemies or enemies below 30% of Max HP, gaining a 25% chance to increase ATK and Movement Speed by 20%, and Attack Speed by 10% for 8 seconds. (CD: 30s)

Title: Manual Labor Expert
Description: Good at heavy works. Proficiency growth rate for wood planing, stone cutting, and kilning +50%

Title: Axe Killer
Description: The ancestral throwing axe skill has the power to render prey fragile. Hitting a target with the throwing axe increases its DMG taken by 10% for 10 seconds.

Title: Lung Piercer
Description: Throws off the prey's breathing rhythm. Hitting a target with the lance reduces its Stamina Recovery by 80% for 10 seconds.

Title: Skilled Work Expert
Description: Attentive to details. Proficiency growth rate for weaving, potting, and leatherworking +50%.

Title: Weapon Master
Description: Proficient in a variety of weapons, DMG dealt with any weapon +10%, Attack Speed +10%.

Title: Hardbone
Description: A true master of endurance. Immune to critical hits if the unit's Resilience is above 50% when attacked.

Title: Nightwalker
Description: Get used to the dark and become a part of it. When moving at night, Movement Speed +10%, Crit +5%.

Title: Born Revolt
Description: Carries an unparalleled sense of self-importance, and never has recognition for others. The speed at which Recognition declines increases by 200%; when Recognition drops too low, defects the tribe with some assets; when Recognition falls below 400, reveals True Self, DMG dealt when attacking from the back of the enemy increases by 15%.

Title: Famous Trash
Description: Fragile mind is easy to break, Max Morale -50%.

Title: Mad Worker
Description: Tireless as a machine and make people worry about the mental health. Max Morale +100%.

Title: Expert Slaughter
Description: The best slaughter in the village; output from slaughtering animals increases by 20%.
